title: 115.19.0esr on Windows7 update today
content:
115.19.0esr on Windows 7 It appears todays update hosed about half of my desktop icons. Each icon still launches their program, but the icon is the generic image. Coincidence?

I downloaded 115.18.0esr and installed it and all my icons are back to normal.

I dont know what happened, or what I did or the update did. I installed the update from inside the browser help screen, not a separate download.

fwiw

creator: sodapuddle

title: Donation
content: To all at Mozilla. 1.I have recently made a donation - as I always do when asked. And have done so for over 20 years. 2. I am now working on my backup site, which I keep on a separate hard drive. 3. I try to check my email and am asked for a donation - again. No way! 4. Now everything fails.My email password. My Firefox password. Fat lot of use saving passwords on Firefox. 5. I try to set up new passwords. I can't paste my new Firefox password into a file. 6. After one and a half hours of this I am not surprised that you need to ask people not to vent their feelings. &. I am an old man and one of the great joys of nearing the end of my life is that you won't be getting any more donations from me after that. Josh.
creator: janfany

title: Browser keeps asking for location services access, but access is allowed
content: After a recent Firefox update about 2 or 3 weeks ago, my Firefox browser keeps asking me to turn on location permissions, but that permission is set to allowed. Searches performed choose my correct location but always prompt for location services access and opens Windows Location Services. This problem is not happening in other Browsers I have tried, only Firefox and only since the update in early to mid-December.

title: I'm having an issue with Youtube
content:
I have a very strange issue with Youtube, specifically when I click on a video. The far right and far left empty space weren't usually this big. I don't know what I did. Some fixes I've tried were: ctrl 0 ctrl - and + to see if anything changes. uninstall reinstall.

Pressing "t" to make it theater mode looks normal. Just specifically when the player is "normal" size. No other websites or pages are affected, not even Youtube's homepage is affected. Literally only when I watch video on the normal player size.

I realize its a minor issue but it bugs me a lot. Thank you.
creator: atakanashi
